message: The Rails guys here at Code for America are getting a lot of mileage out of http://travis-ci.org so I was wondering if there was an equivalent for Python and Django.
I'd also like to see something like that in the Django community
There was something like that with http://devmason.com/
But don't know if it's maintained or how to add projects there
FWIW I got django-continuous-integration working recently. My extensions are here: https://github.com/RockHoward/django-continuous-integration
There's django-jenkins and running Jenkins actually is just something like «./jenkins».
